QuestData.Title: Runaway Rider
QuestData.Description: Lord Norwington demanded I take Eddie out riding in the woods, but I knew it was too soon! I just knew it!$b$bWe've got to go find him. Meet me across the river!
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Melissa Kenny near Mistfall Cleft.
QuestData.RewardText: How could this get any worse?$b$bThe troggs have captured Eddie!
